FixViewModelDI.instruction:
Refactor AgentStateViewModel, EconomicIndicatorsViewModel, and MarketHistoryViewModel to strictly require SimulationRepository via constructor injection, removing default instantiation logic. Refer to the findings in the DI Audit Report.
